titleStmt.title: The difference betwixt the Protestant and Socinian methods in answer to a book written by a Romanist, and intituled, The Protestant's plea for a Socinian.
titleStmt.author: Tenison, Thomas, 1636-1715.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Thomas Tenison. Cf. Halkett & Laing (2nd ed.).
Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
